p: Ethyl (E)-2-(4-methylbenzyl)-3-(pyridin-4-yl)acrylate (3). Flash column chromatography eluting with ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:9 → 3:7) afforded the desired product as a yellowish oil in 42% yield. E: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl3) δ 8.52 (d, J = 5.8 Hz, 2H), 8.02 (s, 1H), 7.49 − 7.31 (m, 5H), 7.15 (s, 2H), 4.24 (q, J = 7.1 Hz, 2H), 3.95 (s, 2H), 1.26 (dd, J = 12.0, 4.9 Hz, 3H).
